input.sentences: a bar is setup at the apartment in anticipation of guests .
the apartment has been cleaned profusely .
chilli is for dinner and it is cooking on the stove .
the group of friends gathers together for a candid picture .
the hosts pose for a picture and smile because they have done their job well .
output.sentences: The bar was set up for guests.
Dinner was cooking on the stove.
The friends gathered for a picture.
Everyone posed with a smile for the picture!
